params.title: Second filter
params.name: Picking Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how sensitive each string will be to picking and strumming. Increase this setting if some strings aren't sensitive enough or decrease it if they're picking up resonance from neighboring string.

params.title: NoteOnLimit
params.name: Maximum Note Duration
params.description: Defines how long a picked note can ring before a Note Off message will be automatically sent.

params.title: Bending mask
params.name: Bending and Vibrato Switch
params.description: Enables / disables bending and vibrato for all strings.

params.title: Sharp mute
params.name: Right-Hand Muting Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easily you can mute the sound by rapidly putting your right hand on the ringing string. Lowering the level helps to fix the problem with open strings that sometimes mute themselves.

params.title: Touch delta
params.name: Left-Hand Muting Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easily you can mute the sound by touching the string on the Jammy fretboard. If you experience sound cut-offs frequently when playing fast solos, it might be worth looking at and making it less sensitive. Same applies for situations when you play open chords and one of the fretting fingers is too close to the nearest open string making it mute.

params.title: Tap On
params.name: Hammer-On and Pull-Off Switch
params.description: Enables / disables hammer-ons, pull-offs and tapping on each string.

params.title: Velocity divider
params.name: Hammer-On and Pull-Off Loudness
params.description: Defines the velocity level of hammer-ons, pull-offs and tapping.

params.title: Tap type
params.name: Hammer-On and Pull-Off Algorithm
params.description: Switches the algorithm that's being used to detect hammer-ons and pull-offs. Set this parameter to '1' for the strings that don't produce hammer-ons or pull-offs even when their sensitivity is set to the maximum.

params.title: deltaDownFilterFretTap
params.name: Hammer-On and Pull-Off Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easy it is to trigger hammer-ons, pull-offs and tapping.

params.title: deltaUpFilterFretTap
params.name: Open String Pull-Off Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easy it is to trigger pull-offs to an open string. This doesn't affect pull-offs to a fret. Lowering this setting will prevent open strings from ringing when you take your fingers off the string.

params.title: Slide On
params.name: Slide Switch
params.description: Enables / disables slides on each string.

params.title: Slide up limit
params.name: Slide Up Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easy it is to slide up the fretboard.

params.title: Slide down limit
params.name: Slide Down Sensitivity
params.description: Defines how easy it is to slide down the fretboard.

params.title: Activity Extension
params.name: Accidental Note Prevention
params.description: Defines the amount of time that hammer-ons, pull-offs, tapping and slides won't be registered after the string was picked (in milliseconds).

params.title: Switch on compressor
params.name: Velocity Compressor Switch
params.description: Enables / disables loudness compression for all picked notes.

params.title: Level
params.name: Velocity Compressor Level
params.description: Defines the velocity level to which the picking loudness will be compressed.

params.title: coefficient
params.name: Velocity Compressor Amount
params.description: Defines how heavily the picking loudness will be pushed up or down towards the selected Velocity Compressor Level.

params.title: Lower velocity limit
params.name: Velocity Minimum
params.description: Defines the minimum velocity of all picked notes. Quieter notes will have their velocity set to the minimum.

params.title: Upper velocity limit
params.name: Velocity Maximum
params.description: Defines the maximum velocity of all picked notes. Louder notes will have their velocity set to the maximum.
